description.zh: LibreChat 是一个受 ChatGPT 启发的开源 AI 聊天平台，旨在支持多种 AI 模型并提供增强的对话体验。它允许用户集成包括 OpenAI、Anthropic、Google 和本地提供商（如 Ollama）在内的多种 AI 服务。该平台提供代码解释、网页搜索、多模态交互和可定制界面等高级功能，适用于个人和专业用途。
description.en: LibreChat is an open-source AI chat platform inspired by ChatGPT, designed to support multiple AI models and provide an enhanced conversational experience. It allows users to integrate various AI services including OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and local providers like Ollama. The platform offers advanced features such as code interpretation, web search, multimodal interactions, and customizable UI, making it a versatile tool for both personal and professional use.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 提供强大、可定制且开源的商业 AI 聊天平台替代方案
- 支持多种云和本地 AI 提供商及模型的集成
- 开箱即用地提供代码执行、网页搜索和图像生成等高级功能
- 通过本地部署和沙箱环境实现安全、私密的 AI 交互
- 社区驱动开发，持续更新，支持多语言

## 功能列表:

- 受 ChatGPT 启发的界面，设计和可用性更佳
- 支持 OpenAI、Anthropic、Google、AWS Bedrock、Azure、Vertex AI 等 AI 模型选择
- 支持任意 OpenAI 兼容 API 的自定义端点
- 支持多种编程语言的沙箱代码执行 API
- 集成代理和工具，支持无代码创建 AI 助手
- 网页搜索，支持内容抓取和结果重排序
- 支持在聊天中生成 React、HTML 和 Mermaid 图表的界面
- 支持通过 DALL-E、Stable Diffusion、GPT-Image 和 MCP 服务器进行图像生成和编辑
- 支持预设与上下文管理，具备对话分支和消息分叉功能
- 支持图像分析和基于文件的对话的多模态功能
- 超过 20 种语言的多语言界面
- 支持 Chain-of-Thought AI 模型的动态推理界面
- 支持语音识别和语音合成，兼容多个服务商
- 支持以多种格式导入/导出对话
- 提供全面的搜索与发现工具
- 支持多用户，集成 OAuth2、LDAP 和邮箱登录
- 支持 Docker、云平台和本地等多种部署方式
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Offers a powerful, customizable, and open-source alternative to commercial AI chat platforms
- Supports integration with a wide range of AI providers and models, both cloud and local
- Provides advanced features like code execution, web search, and image generation out of the box
- Enables secure, private AI interactions with local deployment and sandboxed environments
- Actively maintained and community-driven with multilingual support

## Features:

- UI inspired by ChatGPT with enhanced design and usability
- AI model selection including OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, AWS Bedrock, Azure, Vertex AI, and more
- Custom endpoint support for any OpenAI-compatible API
- Code interpreter API with secure, sandboxed execution in multiple programming languages
- Agents and tools integration with no-code assistant creation
- Web search with content scraping and result reranking
- Generative UI with support for React, HTML, and Mermaid diagrams
- Image generation and editing via DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, GPT-Image, and MCP servers
- Preset and context management with conversation branching and message forking
- Multimodal support for image analysis and file-based conversations
- Multilingual UI available in over 20 languages
- Dynamic Reasoning UI for Chain-of-Thought AI models
- Speech-to-text and text-to-speech support with multiple providers
- Conversation import/export in multiple formats
- Comprehensive search and discovery tools
- Multi-user support with OAuth2, LDAP, and email authentication
- Flexible deployment options including Docker, cloud, and local
